1.0.1.en: Fixed multiple cars support. App store fixes.

1.1.0.en: Bluelink (Hyundai) driver added. Kia PHEV support added. EU, CA, US regions added.

1.2.0.en: Fix dual flow triggers, chager labels, settings and change settings log. Readme and instructions update. Notify device as unavailable on restart. Improved car-active detection. Added ABRP DC fast charger state.

1.3.0.en: Fix target temp setting. Fix target temp scale. Stability improvements. Added command queueing. Added force live via cloud (HTTP GET). Changed forced poll method to GPS.

1.4.0.en: Stability improvements. Fix pairing. Fix log length. Climate control check engine on. Improved queuing. Added rate limiting. Improved car active detection. Prevent dual Homey active triggering.

1.5.0.en: Added action flow cards for A/C on/off, Defrost on/off, set Temp. Added lat/lon capabilities/flow tokens (repair needed). Fix step 0.5 target temp. Improved pairing.

1.6.0.en: Fix live data from app and flow. Fix condition cards. Added flow cards for car moving, parked, closed&locked.

1.6.1.en: Added short URL for remote force. Improved parked detection. Disable/Enable live data and control from flow (privacy mode).

1.7.0.en: Added Estimated Time To Home (ETTH) and Heading Home (repair needed). Updated icons.

2.0.0.en: App rewrite (repair needed). Added charge on/off. Added Google Directions ETTH. Added flowcards. Added parked address. Removed Heading Home. Improved reverse Geo. bluelinky@5.2.3 kuvork@5.4.4

2.0.1.en: Fix ETTH when just parked. Improved car parked detection. Improved error handling. bluelinky@6.0.0 kuvork@6.0.0-alpha4

2.0.3.en: Fix crash when no batSoc (Kia Soul)

2.0.2.en: Fix crash when no batSoc (Kia Soul)

2.1.0.en: Quick fix not able to login for Kia. Hyundai is WIP. Bluelinky removed. kuvork@6.2.0-alpha.1

2.1.1.en: Quick fix not able to login for Kia and Hyundai. kuvork@6.2.0-alpha.5

2.1.2.en: Improved server info after app start. kuvork@6.2.2

2.2.0.en: Added support for Kia Ceed ICE.

2.3.0.en: Added charge limits. Remove EV-capabilities for ICE cars. Improved pairing error feedback. Improved car parked detection. Fixed HTTPS timeout. Log changes Homey V6. Kuvork removed. Bluelinky@7.0.1

2.4.0.en: Added send Navigation destination to car. Fixed car parked detection. Other minor fixes. Readme updated.

2.4.1.en: bluelinky@7.1.0 (fixes login issues new Kia/Hyundai accounts).

2.4.2.en: bluelinky@7.2.0 (fixes login issues special characters and old UVO/Bluelink accounts).

2.4.3.en: Fix isParked flowcard. Improved watchdog. Improved app icon.

2.4.4.en: Quickfix timestamp login issues. bluelinky@7.2.1 + hack

2.5.0.en: bluelinky@7.3.0 (auto timestamps updates). Login caching for reduced API calls. Default update intervals increased. Improved error logging.

2.5.1.en: Improved handling of quotum error. Improved watchdog.

2.5.2.en: bluelinky@7.3.0. Fix google ETTH when parked.

2.6.0.en: bluelinky@7.4.1. Improved defrost control. Add official app language select (EU only).

2.6.1.en: bluelinky@7.5.0. Fix getChargeTargets for PHEV/HEV cars.

2.7.0.en: Added support for Kia Sorento PHEV. Removed chargeTargets for PHEV.

2.7.1.en: bluelinky@7.6.0 (fixes login issues with new Kia accounts).

2.7.2.en: bluelinky@7.6.0 (fixes login issues with new Hyundai accounts).

2.9.0.en: Renamed alarm_batt, meter_odo, meter_range, meter_speed capabilities. Removed state fix after refresh. Enabled local stamp generation. bluelinky@8.0.0-alpha.1. Debug mode on.

2.9.1.en: Renamed alarm_batt, meter_odo, meter_range, meter_speed capabilities. Removed state fix after refresh. Enabled local stamp generation. Added bluelinky startup watchdog. bluelinky@8.0.0-alpha.1.

2.9.2.en: Fixed uncaught rejections. Enabled charge state fix after refresh. Optimized queue handling.

2.9.3.en: Disabled charge state fix after refresh by default. Added setting to enable charge state fix after refresh.

2.9.6.en: Ignore 0 odometer reports third attempt. Keep AC target temperature after shutoff.

2.9.7.en: Fix new Auth for EU region. bluelinky@8.0.0-alpha.2.

2.9.8.en: Fix new Auth for EU region. bluelinky@8.1.1

2.9.9.en: Fix new Auth for EU region. bluelinky@8.1.2

3.0.0.en: Fix reverse geo. Reversed Closed and Locked status. bluelinky@8.2.1
